name: places/ChIJAdfxepVZwokRzluAKiaJtLM
adrFormatAddress: 32 8th Ave, New York, NY 10014-1803, USA

editorialSummary.text: Warm rooms & a suite in a polished guesthouse set in 2 elegant 19th-century houses, plus a lounge.

originalText.text: My daughter and I enjoyed our stay in the Washington suite just before Christmas. Absolutely loved the area and would return. The quirkiness of the hotel was reminiscent of an arts and crafts style house I inhabited in my 20’s. We would return. Easy access to transportation and very safe neighborhood even during early  morning and night.

text.text: My daughter and I enjoyed our stay in the Washington suite just before Christmas. Absolutely loved the area and would return. The quirkiness of the hotel was reminiscent of an arts and crafts style house I inhabited in my 20’s. We would return. originalText.text: Excellent value for money, especially in this location. A few things could be improved, e.g. replacing some of the old rickety furniture, tidying up the garden patio area, but if this place was perfect it would be well out of my price range! Loved having such a well-equipped kitchen, considering that eating out in New York is pricey it was great to be able to eat in the room. Toiletries, hairdryer, room cleaning, and general friendliness of the staff were all fantastic.

text.text: Excellent value for money, especially in this location. originalText.text: 3 night stay during September.  Website great.  Arrival communication great.  The Tabor Room is spacious and well appointed.  Floor was dirty.  Beds creaked terribly every time you roll over but mattress and linens were fine.  Entryway was filthy.  Liked the private entrance but the stairs are narrow and steep so small suitcases are better.  Have to pay for all nights upon arrival so we couldn't have changed hotels if we wanted to.  The location is wonderful if you want to feel like a "local".  Took in River Hudson Park, 9-11 Museum, Washington Square, Comedy Underground.  Easy access to subway.  No one around for Saturday checkout.  Likely to stay here again because of the 2 twin beds.

originalText.text:
Really had awesome experience stay at Halloween weekend here.
Great location , walking distance to all the attractions 8 minute walk to Chelsea market and also have a lot of Chaming Taverns and Cafés around the guest house .
It’s not just a hotel home . It’s a place where has its own character and unique, personality, it’s not just regular hotel’s room
Front desk manager Vincent who is very friendly and also has a very net and interesting charms. I feel like I was staying at the castle where is at the heart of Greenwich Village, Manhattan NYC .
It is not just staying at the hotel room . It felt like we belonging to the village when we stayed here.
Outstanding !!!
We will definitely stay here again and agin

originalText.text: My boyfriend and I came for the weekend. We've been to NYC several times and wanted to stay somewhere less hectic and touristy and this place met our expectations. Checking in and out of the hotel was easy, the hosts were very friendly and helpful. Our room was clean and quaint with interesting personal touches throughout. The location can't be beat. Great restaurants on every corner. Great value and location; would stay again.
